attributes.action: Encourage the use of the word 'Smegma'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition Parliment to pass a private members bill encouraging a greater use of the word 'smegma'.  There is nothing cheesy about this and I'm not being a clever dick.  This is an important issue for all members.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
